ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me, or has anyone else noticed that using a dirk/whip combo and twisting anthem and warsong kills a monster faster than using just the weapons and
ygData.messageBody:
Is it just me, or has anyone else noticed that using a dirk/whip combo and
twisting anthem and warsong kills a monster faster than using just the weapons
and bellow/anthem combo?

Tadian

scott brisko wrote:

> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> Sure I have read everlore, eqvault, harpers, etc. but as much as I had read
> what the effects of Anthem de Arms was, I was never able to guage if the
> weapons speed increase was really working. Part of the problem was that I
> use a Mino axe, (very heavy, long delay) and most of the people that I group
> with are also using mino axes, or equally heavy/slow weapons.
>
> Last night I grouped with a rogue double wielding daggers. I have never seen
> someone hit so hit a mob so many times in my life. It was almost comical.
>
> Bernwyn
> Still being amazed
>
